pageTitle: Prime Minister’s itinerary for Thursday, June 3, 2021 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Ottawa, Ontario

Private meetings.

9:55 a.m. The Prime Minister will drop-in to a virtual meeting with volunteers from the “Faster, Together” initiative to thank them for their hard work and efforts to encourage the uptake of COVID-19 vaccinations across Canada.

Closed to media.

11:00 a.m. The Prime Minister, along with the Minister of Crown-Indigenous Relations Carolyn Bennett, will participate in a virtual event for the launch of the National Action Plan on Missing and Murdered Indigenous Women, Girls and 2SLGBTQQIA+ People.

The event will be streamed live in English, French, and Inuktitut via the following link: https://collaboratevideo.net/CIRNAC-RCAANC.

The Prime Minister will chair the Cabinet meeting.

Closed to media.
